de.ityx.contex.util.datatransfer

Class ClassCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.contex.util.datatransfer.ClassCollector

  • public class ClassCollector
extends Object
    This supporting Class is used to get all mapped Hibernate-Classes of the Subsystems.
    Author:
    heim

      • getMasterField

        public static String getMasterField(Class clazz)
        returns, if a class has a master. Reflection will be used, to find out, if the class or a superclass has a variable that is named master
        Parameters:
        clazz - a Hibernate mapped Class
        Returns:
